text: Ara yake allah patha dekhana se tabe pathaprapta, ara yake tini bipathe calate dena tadera jan'ya tumi pabe na tamra byatireke kono abhibhabaka. Ara kiyamatera dine amara tadera samabeta karaba tadera mukhera upare -- andha, ara boba ebam badhira. Tadera abasasthala hacche jahannama. Yakhana'i ta jhimiye asabe amara tadera jan'ya sikha bariye deba
